title: SLAF hand over another batch of organic fertilizer
body_lines: The Organic Fertilizer Project at SLAF Regiment Training School Vanni, handed over its third batch of organic fertilizer stock of 20 Metric Tons to the Ceylon Fertilizer Company Limited (Lak Pohora) yesterday. A total Qty of 45 Metric Tons have been handed over to the Ceylon Fertilizer Company Limited to date.
